# ⚾ Baseball Closer Performance Analysis (2025)

This project analyzes MLB **closer performance** using Statcast data and machine learning to understand what drives success in high-leverage relief situations.

---

## Project Overview

The notebook explores:
- Pitcher and game-situation metrics
- Base runner states and leverage conditions
- Feature engineering for relief pitching performance
- Predictive modeling using scikit-learn

---

## Tools & Libraries

- Python  
- pandas, numpy  
- pybaseball  
- scikit-learn  
- matplotlib, seaborn  

---

## Repository Structure

├── Baseball_analysis_end_of_2025.ipynb
